Name: Yumkasaurus
Title: Yumkasaurus: Artful Grapple
Desc: Yumkasaurs are extremely skilled at latching onto heavy objects, then pulling themselves forward to move with great rapidity. They're also a great way to retrieve items from afar...

Talent.Name: Yumkasaurus
Talent.Desc: $[K58]: $[S3130021]\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>\n(A character can only equip 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique at a time)

K58.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique</color>
K58.Desc: When the active character is equipped with a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique card, they can use the corresponding {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008} Technique counts as a Combat Action. If the character is unable to use Skills due to conditions like Frozen, Petrification, or Stun, they are also unable to use the {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique.\nUsing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered as using a Skill. Therefore, it cannot trigger effects such as "After using a skill" or "After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction." Damage dealt by using a {SPRITE_PRESET#3008}Technique is not considered Damage dealt by the character.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
